name: MGHG (Horror)
description:
This is my second game, made with Unity. It's an Undertale Horror Game for 2 players. You need a Controller to play it. The player has to survive as long as he can. Gaster has to touch the player or use his ablities to kill him. The player has 2 lifes. 

Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement Player

Controller Joystick + Buttons - Movement + Abilities Gaster

Hope you like it :D
